name: Commodius Vicus
description:
AN ALBUM OF GAMES YOU LIKELY NEVER PLAYED,

BY SOME GUY YOU NEVER HEARD OF.

This is a pretentiously-organized compilation of freeware video games I've developed or led from 2017 to now. It features all of my released games at the time of its publishing as well as a bunch of exclusive bonuses and some supplementary stuff. I hope you enjoy it, or at least find it interesting.

Thanks to everyone who made this possible.
